True.

The user below me has a million dollars, a private yacht, and a 7 story mansion in real life.

(Ha, I have turned your clever trick against you!)

True. I define real life at all stages of life (ie. when I make a million dollar app)

(I've turned your clever trick against you!)

The user below me was incorrect in their previous post.

slightly true. (as your logic doesn't quite make enough sense to counter)

the user below me is ROFLCopter64bit !!!!!!!!!!!!!!

False! I have amazing curves~<3

False. I love building bases.

True and true.

The user below me has great artistic talent!

P.S. Chobit, you got super-ninja'd!

False. (My drawing and handwriting is horrific! )

The user below me is blinking and breathing manually. (I just love doing that one.)

Negative. All of it is pre-programmed, in fact I just updated my randomization software the other day

The user below me is an experienced rider of horses, or cows. I rode a cow once, it was hilarious

False. I rode my dog once when I was 4.

The user below me has played KSP.

False! I only do fanart. That's it, thats all I do with my life, no sleeping, no gaming, no nothing. JUST COLOURS!!!!

The user below me has blown something up IRL in the past year

Maybe. I'm too tired to use my memory.

The person below me is over 18.

True! *yawn*

ZZZZzzzzZZZZ.

f joxeza

stubhff

Mao mao meeow?
False. The user below me is up at a late hour and is tired
False. But I have homework to do.

The user above me forgot to make a statement about me.

The user below me is playing forums games instead of doing their homework.

False. I took a lesurely 30 minutes to do homework. And is still not complete. I don't want school anymore, I want work, work has no homework.

The user below me is still in A school, and as in A school, primary, secondary and university count.

True, I do go to school.
